Chapter.Label: Non-isomorphoric Algebras
Chapter.Heading: Small Algebras
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small MvAlgebra AllSmallMvAlgebra is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic MvAlgebra of orders 2 to 16.
<#Include Label = "AllSmallMvAlgebra">
The output mvalgebra are represented by its operation table for *, as given in Section .

Checking Models of Small MvAlgebra
"IsASmallMvAlgebra" is a function for checking a model against the complete list of non-isomorphic MvAlgebra of orders 2 to 16. It returns true if the model is a Small MvAlgebra, false otherwise.
<#Include Label = "IsASmallMvAlgebra">
